name: Inefficent Deliveryman
description:
Press R to restart

You're a deliveryman who decided that you're job was too boring. Picking up packages and delivering them to their intended location was too bland.

It lacked danger and a sense of adventure, so you decided to make an adventure on your own. But it was still dangerous so you decided to make some contraptions to do it for you. You didn't have much control of the package but it added an interesting challenge.

You're boss did not like it.

Music: Galactic Funk by Nicole Marie T

This was my first 2 day jam and my god it was hectic. It didn't help that the theme was announced at 3am for me (It also didn't help that I stayed up until it was announced). But I learned a lot, mainly that sleep is important and the fear of deadlines really get me working hard
